metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0995 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory write flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™swatch_queue event notification subsystem. This flaw can overwrite parts ofthe kernel state, potentially allowing a local user to gain privilegedaccess or cause a denial of service on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0995` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.17.0-1003-oem - 5.17.0-1003.3
No subscription required
